info.title: Supaglue CRM API
info.description:
# Introduction

Welcome to the Supaglue Actions API (CRM) documentation. You can use this API to read and write data from and to third-party providers.

[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://god.gw.postman.com/run-collection/18172762-fa1c1bb5-8b11-475a-8e9b-d2ad988ccaf0?action=collection%2Ffork&source=rip_markdown&collection-url=entityId%3D18172762-fa1c1bb5-8b11-475a-8e9b-d2ad988ccaf0%26entityType%3Dcollection%26workspaceId%3D4d2a33f3-a9f9-41f4-ac2e-5ad4db4a5edb)

### Base API URL
```
https://api.supaglue.io/crm/v2
```

model.description: Wants to use open source unified API for third-party integrations
model.name: Needs Integrations

value.description: Wants to use open source unified API for third-party integrations
value.name: Needs third-party integrations

post.description: Send request directly to a provider

path.description: The path to send the request to (do not pass the domain)

query.description: Query parameters to pass to downstream

url.description: The full URL the request was went to

headers.description: The response headers from the downstream

tags.name: Accounts
tags.description: The `Account` Common Model is used to represent a "company" in CRMs.

tags.name: Contacts
tags.description: The `Contact` Common Model is used to represent a "contact" in CRMs.

tags.name: Leads
tags.description: The `Lead` Common Model is used to represent a "potential customer" in CRMs.

tags.name: Opportunities
tags.description: The `Opportunity` Common Model is used to represent a "deal opportunity" in CRMs.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: The `User` Common Model is used to represent a "user" that can login to CRMs.

tags.name: CustomObjectClasses
tags.description: The `Custom Object Class` Common Model is used to represent a "custom object class" in CRMs.

tags.name: CustomObjects
tags.description: The `Custom Object` Common Model is used to represent a "custom object" in CRMs.

tags.name: AssociationTypes
tags.description: The `Association Type` Common Model is used to represent an "association type" in CRMs.

tags.name: Associations
tags.description: The `Association` Common Model is used to represent an "association" in CRMs.

ApiKeyAuth.name: x-api-key
ApiKeyAuth.description: API key to allow developers to access the API

Wants to use open source unified API for third-party integrations

custom_fields.description: Custom properties to be inserted that are not covered by the common model. Object keys must match exactly to the corresponding provider API.

include_deleted_data.name: include_deleted_data
include_deleted_data.description: Whether to include data that was deleted in providers.

include_raw_data.name: include_raw_data
include_raw_data.description: Whether to include raw data fetched from the 3rd party provider.

created_after.name: created_after
created_after.description: If provided, will only return objects created after this datetime

created_before.name: created_before
created_before.description: If provided, will only return objects created before this datetime

modified_after.name: modified_after
modified_after.description: If provided, will only return objects modified after this datetime

modified_before.name: modified_before
modified_before.description: If provided, will only return objects modified before this datetime

page_size.name: page_size
page_size.description: Number of results to return per page

x-customer-id.name: x-customer-id
x-customer-id.description: The customer ID that uniquely identifies the customer in your application
